article_title: Ashland Inc. dropping 65-plus retiree medical, dental coverage
article_text:
Ashland’s move does not affect vested benefits such as pension

Some retiree benefits “unsustainable,” company says

Company freezing pension plan for 650 active employees

article_metadata.news-keywords: ashland, oil, valvolvine, retiree, insurance, medical, dental, life, pension, boyd, employees
article_metadata.description: Ashland Inc. is dropping employer-sponsored medical and dental coverage for its retirees 65 and older; it has also limited how much life insurance it will pay for them. The company calls the level of retiree benefits it provided “unsustainable,” and is also freezing the pension plan of current employees.
article_metadata.title: Ashland Inc. dropping 65-plus retiree medical, dental coverage | Lexington Herald-Leader
